import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Search, Star, Clock, Award, Trophy } from 'lucide-react'; const GamesEdukatif = () => { const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState('all'); const gameCategories = [ { id: 'all', name: 'Semua', icon: '🎮' }, { id: 'hewan', name: 'Hewan', icon: '🦁' }, { id: 'tumbuhan', name: 'Tumbuhan', icon: '🌺' }, { id: 'manusia', name: 'Manusia', icon: '👤' } ]; const games = [ { id: 1, title: "Tebak Hewan Berdasarkan Habitat", category: "hewan", description: "Temukan hewan yang cocok dengan habitatnya!", difficulty: "Mudah", duration: "10 menit", points: "100", image: "/api/placeholder/300/200", players: "2,345" }, { id: 2, title: "Susun Bagian Tubuh Manusia", category: "manusia", description: "Letakkan organ tubuh di tempat yang tepat!", difficulty: "Sedang", duration: "15 menit", points: "150", image: "/api/placeholder/300/200", players: "1,890" }, { id: 3, title: "Identifikasi Bagian Tumbuhan", category: "tumbuhan", description: "Kenali bagian-bagian penting dari tumbuhan!", difficulty: "Mudah", duration: "12 menit", points: "120", image: "/api/placeholder/300/200", players: "3,120" }, { id: 4, title: "Puzzle Metamorfosis Kupu-kupu", category: "hewan", description: "Susun tahapan perubahan kupu-kupu dengan benar!", difficulty: "Sedang", duration: "15 menit", points: "150", image: "/api/placeholder/300/200", players: "2,780" } ]; const filteredGames = selectedCategory === 'all' ? games : games.filter(game => game.category === selectedCategory); return (
{/* Hero Banner */}

); }; export default GamesEdukatif;
